# Forward Email

> Forward Email is a 100% open-source and privacy-focused email service. We provide free email forwarding for custom domains, along with a full suite of tools for developers and businesses, including a comprehensive API, webhooks, and robust security features.

Important notes:

- We are a privacy-first company and do not store or read your emails.
- Our service is built on open-source software, and our code is available on GitHub.
- We support modern email standards, including SPF, DKIM, DMARC, and MTA-STS.

## Documentation

- [Quick Start Guide](https://forwardemail.net/faq): Learn how to set up email forwarding in minutes.
- [Frequently Asked Questions](https://forwardemail.net/faq): Find answers to common questions about our service.
- [Developer Documentation](https://forwardemail.net/blog/docs): Explore our developer resources, including guides and tutorials.

## API

- [API Reference](https://forwardemail.net/email-api): Detailed documentation for our RESTful API.
- [OpenAPI Specification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/forwardemail/forwardemail.net/master/assets/api-spec.json): The full OpenAPI v3 specification for our API.

## Community

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/forwardemail/forwardemail.net): Our main open-source repository.

## Optional

- [Technical Whitepaper](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/forwardemail/forwardemail.net/master/assets/technical-whitepaper.pdf): A deep dive into our quantum-resistant encrypted email service.
- [Self-Hosting Guide](https://github.com/forwardemail/forwardemail.net/blob/master/SELFHOSTING.md): Instructions for self-hosting our email stack.
